titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to Daniel W. Lindsey
CWG13772

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1864 Clothing, Camp & Garrison Equipage, Telegraph Expenses, Some Claim Letters; Bundle 1

body.p:
No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To D. W. Lindsey Insptr Genl Dr.

row.cell: To Services rendered in the organization of the Enrolled Militia of the State and in commanding state troops during the month of June

body.p: This Claim is approved and the Q. M. Genl is ordered to pay the Same out of the Militia fund.
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

S. G. Suddarth
Quarter-Master Gen. Ky.
Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the of 186, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Dollars, and Cents, in full of the above account.

D. W. Lindsey
Insp Genl Ky.

No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To D. W. Lindsey Insptr Genl Dr.

1864.
DOLLARS. CENTS.
June 30th To. Services rendered in the organization of the Enrolled Militia of the State and in commanding state Troops during the month of June $225 --
approved
This claim is and the said Q M Genl. is ordered to pay the same out of the Militia fund.
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

S. G. Suddarth
Quarter-Master Gen. Ky.
Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the of 186, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Dollars, andCents, in full of the above account.

D. W. Lindsey
Insp Genl Ky.

No. 22.
No. Abstract B Qr. 186.
D W Lindsay
Dollars 225 00/100
Paid 30 June, 1864.
